songs.title: Funky 2 Listen 2
songs.lyrics:
[Scratched and repeated]
Funky 2 Listen 2

[Large Professor]
I've been interactin' with people from town to town
And what we all have in common I've found's renowned
It's some... (Funky 2 Listen 2) Play in the jeep
Or the walkman, see, I stay in the street
Where you gotta have $!%&, can't be no stiff
'Cause a stiff-ass nigga just slips off the cliff
Of reality, tryin' to earn a salary
Yeah, that's cool, but you must understand the golden rule
That if it ain't broke, don't fix it, my man
It's like Chuck Chillout would say (Understand?)
I'm comin' with the ill type truck on the product'
So you'll never have to worry, 'cause my vision ain't blurry
I see the big picture in this, and can't miss
When I shoot my shot, I get more raw and hot
So if you wanna sell-out, man, I'm not dissin' you
Hittin' that ass with some... (Funky 2 Listen 2)

[Scratched and repeated till the end]
Funky 2 Listen 2
